items.sentence: Tom said his parents let him do what he wants.
My room is number fourteen on the third floor.
My mother looked at me with tears in her eyes.
My great-grandfather was the leader of a gang.
If I were you, I wouldn't pitch my tent there.
If I were you, I wouldn't tell Tom about that.
Do you have anything planned for this evening?
I bought a laser pointer for the presentation.
I want to learn as many languages as possible.
Both of the entrances to the room are guarded.
